QAPair.Question: What is (are) Diverticulitis and diverticulosis - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: You were in the hospital to treat diverticulitis. This is an infection of an abnormal pouch (called a diverticulum) in your intestinal wall (most commonly in the sigmoid colon). This article tells you how to take care of yourself when you leave the hospital.
